text:
I have another video from <@U3T21PDBK> of Ascend Inbound Marketing, which breaks down the similarities and differences of PHP and HubSpot’s HubL.
<https://youtu.be/N2etfQC37_0>

nice, <@U3T21PDBK>! i have a bunch of clients with old WP sites who have added HS on for marketing, so I go back and forth a lot, but this is a super clear overview for those of us who don’t work this way regularly!
